name: Spyro: Enter the Dragonfly
description: Spyro: Enter the Dragonfly is a platform video game, part of the Spyro series, developed by Check Six Games and Equinoxe Digital Entertainment and published by Vivendi Universal Games. It was released for PlayStation 2 and GameCube; it was to be ported to the Xbox and Microsoft Windows, but were both cancelled. The game was poorly received by critics due to its short length, poor controls and numerous bugs and glitches.
